name: be water
description:
Bruce Lee was one of the most, if not the most influential Asian American. He taught us how to be proud of who we are and to express
it fully without hesitance or compromise. He taught his martial arts and
his philosophy to anyone who would listen, breaking all boundaries. He taught us that there’s a time to roll with the punches, but also a time to unite and stand up for each other.

“Water can flow, or it can crash. Be water, my friend.”
